nl.ctmm.trait.proteomics.qcviewer

Class Reader

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.ctmm.trait.proteomics.qcviewer.zzz_old.input.Reader

  • public class Reader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements logic to read the QC Reports Folder and and prepares data to be displayed in the summary table.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Reader(java.lang.String rootFolder)
      This constructor requires location of QC Reports Directory as input.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<ReportUnit> prepareReportArrayList()
      This function looks for three files for each msreading in the QC Reports Directory: Metrics.json: Contains values of following parameters: date of msreading, filesize, runtime, ms1Sepctra and ms2Sepctra.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reader

        public Reader(java.lang.String rootFolder)
        This constructor requires location of QC Reports Directory as input. It also constructs fixed N/A Icon that is displayed in case of lack of heatmap and ioncount images.
        Parameters:
        rootFolder - the location of QC Reports Folder

    • Method Detail

      • prepareReportArrayList

        public java.util.List<ReportUnit> prepareReportArrayList()
        This function looks for three files for each msreading in the QC Reports Directory: Metrics.json: Contains values of following parameters: date of msreading, filesize, runtime, ms1Sepctra and ms2Sepctra. heatmap.png: Heatmap file. ions.png: ioncount file.
        Returns:
        List of all prepared reports - according to the ReportUnit format.
        See Also:
        ReportUnit
